page.title: 07FARMING IN DITTON PRIORS
page.content: The{agriculture}aspect in our area is mainly grassland followed by crops. Animals roam the fields of grass,and eat barley,wheat and other crops in the winter.Water is piped to the fields because slopes take away natural water to lower ground.The{ {Boyne Estate}owns a vast portion of land in our scector.Grassland stretches for{76 fields}in our area, the other 29 are crop fields.The most profitable crops are {oil-seed-rape} barley, wheat and oats.The grassland is used mainly for dairy farming.The narrow roads make it hard for the milk tankers to travel round the area. There are 3 main animals which are farmed in the area,{Beef livestock, {dairy cows and sheep.}On the Depot there is a lot of farming which is mostly crops the two main crops they grow are barley and wheat.
